Message:
Ordinary weapons have
no effect against demons.

So, after joining the Armed Forces,
I was given a large cannon.

If I master it, I’ll be able to
level even an entire mountain.
But, when I fired it,
I was only able to break
a few rocks.

Some of the more
seasoned soldiers saw
that and laughed at me,
saying, “You don’t pull
a trigger with your finger.
You pull it with your heart.”

I won’t deny that
I’m still inexperienced.
But, when it comes to
the strength of heart,
no one can beat me.

I am going to become
Commander Paladea, after all.

I’ll show you exactly how
to turn heart into power.

My voice resounded
as I pulled the trigger.

But, only tiny singes were
left on the rocks sitting
in the line of fire.
